fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Raid a player. Their abilities are nullified.
- Raid a player. Their attributes are nullified.
- Raid a player. Their life is nullified. (3 uses, can only be used on Even nights.)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- After being raided, your targets gain the ability to Repair, which is a night ability that restores all lost abilities and attributes but sets their defense to Vulnerable for the night.
- All Neutral roles except for Neutral (Benign) are immune to all raids, and you are immune to all negative abilities used by Neutral roles.
- If you are the last living Crew member and are not visited for three nights in a row, you will become a random non-Neutral role. You can only become roles which have living members in their faction.
